tasks.label: build: active + main.c
args: OUT="${fileDirname}/app"; SDK="$(xcrun --show-sdk-path)"; ACTIVE="${file}"; MAIN="${fileDirname}/main.c"; if [ ! -f "$MAIN" ]; then echo "[ERROR] main.c not found in ${fileDirname}"; exit 1; fi; if [ "$(basename "$ACTIVE")" = "main.c" ]; then xcrun clang -std=c11 -Wall -Wextra -g -isysroot "$SDK" "$MAIN" -o "$OUT"; else xcrun clang -std=c11 -Wall -Wextra -g -isysroot "$SDK" "$MAIN" "$ACTIVE" -o "$OUT"; fi
